"Main_Content":
"Heat president Pat Riley regrets not giving Dwyane Wade a max contract in 2014
by Ashish MathurApril 9
"Time":
2019


Miami Heat president Pat Riley regrets not giving Dwyane Wade a max contract
in the summer of 2014 after LeBron James left South Beach to go back to the
Cleveland Cavaliers.

2014年夏天，LeBron James離開熱火回到騎士。
熱火總裁Pat Riley近日接受訪問，後悔當時沒有開給Dwyane Wade頂薪合約。

After James left
"Max_Word_Indicator": Riley and the Heat gave Wade a two-year
column6:
$31.125 million
deal. Wade left the Heat in the summer of 2016 and signed with his hometown
Chicago Bulls.

就在LeBron離開熱火後，熱火開給Wade兩年3110萬的合約。
兩年後的夏天，Wade離開熱火，回到家鄉與公牛簽約。

Riley says had he given Wade a max contract in 2014
column7:
the Miami icon would
have never left for the Bulls:

Riley說，如果他當時開給Wade頂薪的話，
這位熱火隊魂將會永留邁阿密而不是前往芝加哥。

“The biggest mistake that I made was not to just recommend that we sign
Dwyane and Chris to max contracts as soon as LeBron left
column9:
” Riley told Anthony Chiang of the Miami Herald. “What we
wanted to do and what I wanted to do was not to use Dwyane
column10:
but to use the
opportunity to pay him and at the same time bring in another superstar.

在接受《Miami Herald》Anthony Chiang採訪時，

Riley表示：

「我這輩子犯的最大錯誤，就是在LeBron離開後，沒有同時給Wade & Bosh頂薪，

然後圍繞他們建隊。我們當時不是想利用Wade，而是想利用給他合約的機會，

再趁機簽下另一個超級球星。」

“We should have just bit the bullet. He was our franchise guy. We had just
been to the Finals four years in a row. They had already played the give-back
game
column12:
LeBron and Dwyane to keep Mike Miller and to keep Udonis Haslem.
So this was the time now to pay both of them. And we paid Chris and we did
not pay Dwyane. If we had done that
column13:
he would have been here. He would have
never left. This would have been his last year [on the contract]
column14:
his fifth
year.”

「我們當時應該咬緊牙關，他可是我們的隊魂。
我們剛連續四年殺進總決賽，他們已經為球隊降過薪了，
Bosh、LeBron、Wade三人當時為了留下Mike Miller & Udonis Haslem而降薪。

所以當時是個很好的機會去補償他們兩個，但我們最終只給Bosh頂薪而沒有給Wade，
如果我們當時給了，那麼Wade就會永遠留在這了，他絕對不會離開，
今年也將會是他合約的最後一年，他的第五年。」

Wade has never been the highest-paid player on the Heat at any point during
his legendary career with the franchise.

在Wade的職業生涯裡，Wade從未成為熱火隊中薪水最高的那個人。

--
